definition: Gradual transfer of responsibility from instructor to learner: I do, we do, you do

positive_examples: First I'll show you, then we'll do one together, then you try on your own.
I do, we do, you do.
Gradually shifting from teacher control to student control.
Watch me, help me, show me, let me watch you.
negative_examples: Figure it out yourself from the start.
I'll always be here to help you through it.
Just keep watching me do it.
training_hints.disambiguation: Gradual handoff of control, not constant support or abandonment
